name: Insectonator: Zombie Mode
summary:
The Insectonator series continues with Insectonator: Zombie Mode, where instead of killing bugs, you kill zombies that are only the size of bugs. There is a new mode called 'Don't Touch My Gem,' where you defend your gem from being taken by zombies within the time limit, along with a new variety of weapons such as the sword and basketball, along with many other old weapons.

All in all, shoot and blast your way to victory!
